sections.title: Demoniac (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Demoniac class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Demoniac)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple weapons and the demonic patron's favored weapon, but no additional armor or shield proficiencies.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Demoniac)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting progression from a previous class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and effective caster level without other class benefits.

sections.title: Damned (Ex) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Upon death, the demoniac's soul is claimed by the Abyss and resurrection requires a caster level check (DC 10 + demoniac level).

sections.title: Demonic Mark (Ex) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Once per day, can cast a spell without expending it by adding chaotic and evil descriptors through the demonic patron's mark.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Must perform daily obedience to the demon lord to maintain all demoniac abilities, incorporated into spellcasting preparation routine.

sections.title: Energumen (Su) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Allows demonic possession as a free action, granting profane bonuses and resistances but causing confusion afterward.

sections.title: Demonic Boon (Demoniac)
sections.description: Grants three increasingly powerful boons from the demon lord at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels, accessed earlier than normal progression.

sections.title: Summon Demon (Sp) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Can use summon monster VI at 4th level and summon monster VIII at 8th level to conjure specific demons once per day each.

sections.title: Demonic Form (Ex) (Demoniac)
sections.description: Transforms into a unique demon with outsider type, damage reduction, energy resistances, telepathy, and chosen physical modifications for limited duration.
